c:complexType.name: DateFormat
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation of the date format class.
A date format formats numbers by using a formatting mask.
The format mask is the same as that expected by the strftime function in C. See the protovis' documentation of the function pv.Format.date for the actual format mask syntax ().
The current date format implementation does not provide a configurable date style.
The null value is formatted as an empty string.
See for more information on inheritance of formatting configurations.
